import React from 'react' import './booking.css' import {Form,FormGroup,ListGroupItem,ListGroup,Button} from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} = tour return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating ===0? null:avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
Information
) } export default Booking
